org.apache.storm.hbase.topology

Class WordCountValueMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.storm.hbase.topology.WordCountValueMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, HBaseValueMapper

    public class WordCountValueMapper
extends Object
implements HBaseValueMapper

    Takes a Hbase result and returns a value list that has a value instance for each column and corresponding value. So if the result from Hbase was 

     WORD, COUNT apple, 10 bannana, 20

    this will return 

      [WORD, apple]
    [COUNT, 10]  [WORD, banana]
    [COUNT, 20]

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
